title: How to Change the Post Date on Blogger

steps.headline: First go to Posts on your main Blogger screen.
Find the post that you would like to change and click Edit.
At the bottom left, click Post Settings.
Change the date to whatever you would like.

text:
First go to Posts on your main Blogger screen. Click on Edit. Find the post that you would like to change and click Edit. At the bottom left, click Post Settings. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e6/Change-the-Post-Date-on-Blogger-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e6/Change-the-Post-Date-on-Blogger-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":186,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":307.8481012658228,"licensing":"

Find the post that you would like to change and click Edit.
At the bottom left, click Post Settings.
